## Welcome to DIY Fieldwork [Under construction] {.unnumbered}

This site provides an overview and accompaning manual for use of our field and laboratory equipment in the Hydrology Group at the [University of Bern](http://www.geography.unibe.ch/forschung/hydrologie). 


Please report any questions/bugs to [issues].(https://github.com/hydro-unibern/field-instructions/issues)
